Package GJIM

Class Main

java.lang.Object
GJIM.Main
public class Main extends Object
Main program calling the Grape Juice Image Manipulation library.

      Parameters:

      p1 - Point 1's X position.
      c1 - Point 1's Y position.
      p2 - Point 2' X position.
      c2 - Point 2's Y position.
